text: hi all, I am getting a 'Failed to save' error on my modules. Anyone else experiencing that?
I think I’m seeing it fixed, refreshed and now it’s not hollering at me
there needs to be an emote gif added to this slack showing Hagrid saying “You’re a wizard Coley!”
Anyone know how long it takes for a URL mapping to take effect once its added to the URL Mappings area?
well, thats a large timeframe lol
advanced menus dragging and dropping menu items isn’t always easy especially when you get to the third level links, <https://spin.d.pr/fzEbz3+>

also trying to select text in the field(say you just want to change 1 word or correct a typo) drags the whole thing. the input field itself is the one exception where i don’t want the draggy droppyness

another thing. while I totally dig the different types of links you allow picking in the advanced menu now. it’d be nice if there was a way to quick-add them instead of having to do 2 clicks every time.

And the quick add would default to one of the settings. 

Because building menus that involve 20 something links gets tiring.

proposed solution for doing quick-add

IF you’re typing in text/url field for the label of a menu item and you hit enter it adds a new item directly below it

Hey there, Anyone use the DreamPack Blog by COS Studios for their business or clients? We currently use it and wondered why when I click on a specific category (for instance just want to see all blog posts associated with “Growth Driven Design”) I’m also seeing the most current blog post like “Sales and Marketing Alignment”. Anyone know how to maneuver the template to only see the called out category? Has this been an issue for anyone with this template or elsewhere? Here is an example where we use it on our site <http://blog.dmagelimedia.com/blog/topic/growth-driven-design>
